SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CSCEngine
A class representing a CSC ship engine.
CSCGun
* This class represents a specific weapon, a gun, that belongs to the Canadian Surface Combatant ship.
CSCShip
The CSCShip class is a type of Ship that can be built using a specific ShipFactory.
CSCShipFactory
The CSCShipFactory class is a concrete implementation of the ShipFactory interface, responsible for creating specific Surface Ship objects with CSC specifications.
Engine
An interface representing a ship engine.
HCEngine
A class representing an HC ship engine.
HCGun
This class represents a gun that can be used as a weapon in a ship.
HCShip
This class represents a Halifax Class Ship, which is a type of Ship.
HCShipFactory
This class represents a factory that produces Halifax Class Ships.
Ship
The abstract class representing a ship.
ShipBuilding
An abstract class representing a ShipBuilding process that provides a method for creating a Canadian Ship of a particular type.
ShipFactory
The ShipFactory interface defines the required equipments for creating a Ship object.
ShipFactroryTest
Main class for testing the Ship Factory design pattern.
SurfaceShipBuilding
A class representing the process of building surface ships, which extends the abstract ShipBuilding class and provides a method for creating a Canadian Surface Ship of a particular type.
Weapon
An interface representing a ship weapon.
